website_summaries.verdict: A well-designed boot that protects little feet from cold, wet winter conditions.
pros: Velcro straps keeps feet snug and in place
Comfortable to wear and easy to get on and off
cons: They run small, so you might need to order one size larger than usual

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boots for my girls!
customer_reviews.text: I spent so much time looking at different snow shoes for my two girls. These boots are fantastic. They are easy to get on and strap up so the kids can do it. They need a little help getting them off sometimes. The strap at the top is great to keep the snow out and really works! The kids say that they are comfortable and we played in the snow for a long long time with no complaints. Yay!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: design is not good for toddler
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of a removable liner. However, the boot does not open up enough to get my child's foot into it. She would need to bend her foot to get in, and she is too young to do that. I can't get her foot in by jamming it down. Tried having her stand up in them, still didn't work. I ordered the boot 2 sizes larger than her shoe size, anticipating her foot might grow over the winter, so the problem is not that it's too small. Disappointed but might try this style again when she's older and can put her own shoes/boots on.
customer_reviews.author: mary29

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: We live in northern Utah; I purchased these for my son after owning a series of sub-standard winter boots purchased at one of the big retail chains that starts with "W". The other boots not only get water-logged, but they stitching comes apart after a little while. I finally bit the bullet and bought these high-quality boots. They are really great. My son loves them so much that he even wants to wear them even though the snow is now gone; they're that comfortable. And they are so far very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Galbraith

customer_reviews.title: An excellent purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent boots!!! This color was cheaper than the other options, and I have no idea why. Maybe it isn't as popular, but they are very nice looking. My son is just starting to wear a size 3 (they are a little big) and I purchased these in a 4. He can wear them now, but I wanted room to grow and warm socks to fit. My son LOVES these. The liners easily come out if he is just going creek walking in the summer and wants to keep his feet dry, and pop right back in for snow and winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love the boots but upon my son putting them on for the first time one of the top sinches was broken off. We needed boots and don't have the time to return and wait. We will take them to a shoe repair place following our trip and hopefully be able to get that repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat a known standard.
customer_reviews.text: I searched for weeks online comparing kids snow boots. I finally came back to the Columbia Powderbugs as both kids had previous versions and they worked well. My son wore them today for the first time, and while I bought them big on purpose, they seemed to stay on great with the strap. Really can't beat the price for a true snow shoe. These aren't "fashion" snow shoes, they really are icey, snowy, winter boots. Feet stay dry! I knew when I ordered I would get a quality product. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: K. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Not good for young children
customer_reviews.text: My son wears a size 5 toddler and we cannot get these boots on him to save our lives! They’re too narrow around the ankle for a toddler you can’t just push their foot down in it and most toddlers don’t know to bend their foot to get it into a narrow shoe. I did end up returning these. They would be amazing for him in a few years but I do not recommend getting them for a 2 year old
customer_reviews.author: MTdale

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design. Be prepared for lots of aggravation.
customer_reviews.text: These are simply awful to put on a child. There are no places to grip the boot and they are very very tight inside with not much wiggle room. You will basically have to mash your child's foot into these while bracing their knees. I expected a lot more from a company like Columbia. A loop on the top rear of the boot would have been a nice addition but overall I would still pass on these.
customer_reviews.author: Chris1683

customer_reviews.title: Super warm and super fast to clean and dry!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! Little guy has been dry and warm! Bonus is that they come apart to shell, liner and inner boot to wash and dry after the little guy gets them soaked in a creek!!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley & Vickie Mcnees

customer_reviews.title: super narrow feet that I don't ever recall seeing on ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the correct size BUT the liners are made for skinny, super narrow feet that I don't ever recall seeing on any child. To make them work, we removed the liner and used super thick, warm socks. This was a great success because we can slowly change the bigness of the socks as her feet grow so they should last along time. Honestly when she was born her feet were NEVER as narrow as the liners inside the boot are. The advantage is, you can take out the liners and also I liked you can tighten them around the ankle so they don't fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer and Seller on Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Seasonal Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've have purchased this same boot for my puddle stomping, snow crushing, mud magnet, very active son for the past 3 years. They hold up after his careless keeping of them. His feet stay dry! This kid of mine will wear out shoes every other month but these boot last all winter for my 10year-old 5ft 100lb little boy.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Liner makes boots run very small
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like nice, warm boots - but the liner inside was so thick, the boots were much too tight and small for my son (who has small, narrow feet and usually fits easily into even more narrow shoes). Liner seemed to make the boots run at least 1 size smaller than advertised, rather than being true to size. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in the size I usually need in other kids shoes/boots, but they were smaller than expected. I sent them back and the return process was very easy. They seemed like really nice boots, so I planned to go back and order them again in a larger size. Within a week the price had increased almost 20$. I went elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: MsScott

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots kept my son's feet warm and dry. Now they have been handed down the line to my middle son. They still look really nice and work just as well as they did the first day I bought them. I only give 4 stars because snow seems to always creep it's way into the top. A very small amount but would be perfect if none did.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Overall great! Runs small
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice boots! And we got them for under $30 which is a steal! I was surprised by the fit. My son measures a kids 2 and we bought these in a 3 thinking they would fit for next year too. They fit perfectly now (October), hope they will still fit when the snow comes.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Columbia kids boots
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for high quality winter boots for kids than these are awesome! They are very sturdy and reliable. They have a thick layer for traction at the bottom. The proper amount of padding to keep your child’s feet warm in a blizzard. You will not have to worry about any snow or water getting through these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight B

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to get on child's foot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are well constructed and are very cute. However, even with ordering up a size, I could not get this boot on my child's foot. There is more than enough room for her foot in it, but the part where the neck of the boot meets the shoe is very stiff and narrow and you can't the foot all the way in. The velcro strap does not open it up any wider to get them on. I returned these.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 4 for my daughter who wears a 3 1/2 now, had her try them on and she couldn’t even get her foot in.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy, returned
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my 5 year old and he is a big kid but said the boots were too heavy and not very comfortable. They seem like good quality but they were just a bit too heavy for comfortable wear so we returned them and bought a different pair.
customer_reviews.author: DNA Mom and Dad

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed in MN!
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy but love that he doesn’t have laces and will protect from snow going inside the boot. Easy to slip on and off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small boot liner.
customer_reviews.text: The boots looked great when we got them. I ordered them a size bigger than what my son wears, a size 6. While the boot itself is big, the insert is so small, it really seems more like the insert is a size 4. It is such a struggle to get his foot in and then it's being squeezed. If I were to order the next size up, he would struggle to walk in them. Disappointed with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Wendorf

customer_reviews.title: This was a great score. I had to buy snow boots for ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great score. I had to buy snow boots for my daughter just before the January blizzard. They fit great, were comfortable, and if we didn't have 2.5 feet of snow, they would have totally kept the snow out (they didn't do a bad job as it was). Daughter's feet stayed warm.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if someone made toddler snow boots that DONT have ...
customer_reviews.text: Would be great if someone made toddler snow boots that DONT have super chunky soles. Seriously they could be rubber coated and have squared grippy texture to the bottom without being tripping hazards. As far as construction and quality materials these are really nice. Warm. My toddler loves them. They mean snow.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H

customer_reviews.title: Great Winter Boots
customer_reviews.text: We live in Wisconsin and have had a nice amount of snow so far. These boots keep my son's feet dry and warm! He has played in the snow at recess, and has no complaints. So far, they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son hated them as soon as he put them on. The thick rubber sides pushed through the padding and hit funny on his ankles. Maybe they would have loosened up, but I didn’t want to take the chance, so we returned them.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot but order a size up
customer_reviews.text: Not true to size. Nice boot but order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Good boots, just need better inner linings so water isnt settling under the feet.
customer_reviews.text: Only problem was the inner lining wasn't sealed so the bottom of my sons feet were constantly wet and pruny. The fit great and looked great. Would buy again if the lining kept water from getting to the feet. They returned them for free and they refunded the full amount I paid including the shipping. I would recommend buying from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: just want to shop

customer_reviews.title: Fit my son as expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought my 7 year old son this for Christmas and ended up giving him earlier due to the snow that came unexpectedly and he loves them! Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I would pass on these...
customer_reviews.text: The boots by themself would have fit...but....the insert was Extremely small...and the insert is extremely hard to get in and out if the boot🙁 I would recommend a boot without and insert for a toddler...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strings on boot need to be fixed
customer_reviews.text: My kids love them. I brought two and they are wearing them all the time. I would have given a full five stars but when you pull the string to tighten the top of the boot, it doesn't come out from one side. Instead, I had to keep pulling the string from on side more than the other.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy keep feet dry
customer_reviews.text: The boots were lovely blue color and had the nice inserts to take out to dry when they get wet but I ordered a size up thinking he could wear them next year, but he said they were too big and that was my fault.. otherwise these boots are nice and sturdy and keep the wet snow out.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fits way too small
customer_reviews.text: My son is a size 6 in shoe size and due to some lining in these boots the size 6 was way too small--Not sure if going up one size would even work due to the lining and afraid that if going up too many sizes they will be too bulky to run/walk around in. The look and quality seem fine though, it is just the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Girls Youth Powderbug Plus
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, cuddly and warm. They are definitely durable and very warm (I love the removable "sock"). The soles have excellent threading for traction, the rubber is flexible yet solid and the boot is just very well made. Thank you Columbia for another very well made product!!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Meena

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, just runs small!
customer_reviews.text: Seem to fit somewhat small. My son wears a 3 in most shoes, except one pair of shoes is a 4. I ordered a 3 in these, and they were too small. I returned (which was a very easy and smooth process!!!) and ordered a size 4. My son said these fit snugly but will work. They are otherwise sharp looking boots and look well made. Impressive boot, would definately buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: yoadri99

customer_reviews.title: Useful snow boots.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this pair of boots on the large size so our granddaughter could wear them both this winter and next. They fit her fine and she enjoys wearing them. Too bad we did not have much snow this year so she could have used them even more. They were made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Duane T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boot for cold and deep snow
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to slip on, warm to 25 below zero! Velcro strap makes them snug on foot. Sleeve protects pant leg from snow. Perfect winter boot for kid.
customer_reviews.author: Martha W. Bonney

customer_reviews.title: Durable for rough outdoor play
customer_reviews.text: These have kept my daughters feet dry and warm in snow, slush, and rain. Very well made and the fabric hasn't taken in any stains despite being covered in dirty snow and some mud.
customer_reviews.author: tmq

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and off!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size up thinking my son would fit in them an extra year which seems to be possible. He loves how easy they are to get on and off on his own. Kept his feet dry and warm in single digits and wet/snowy weather
customer_reviews.author: Emily Eutsler

customer_reviews.title: Great kids boot
customer_reviews.text: Really nice winter boot. My son says they keep his feet warm and are easy to get on and off
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Warm and toasty
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. They arrived in a couple of days. I didn't realize my son had outgrown his other snow boots and was happy I could get the item quickly. They are well made and I bought them a little larger than the size of sneakers my son normally wears. We wear thicker socks in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: M S Brown

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! Kept a ten year old's feet dry and warm in over a foot of snow, during a week's worth of play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson first Christmas..hope he likes them. They look very nice
customer_reviews.author: S. Panicola

customer_reviews.title: The boot is perfect for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: The boot is perfect for my granddaughter. I ordered a size larger than her shoe size to allow for warm socks. The ankle straps secure the boot and the elastic at the top keeps the snow out. We had the blizzard of 2016 last Fri and Sat so the boots were put to use right away. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot. Would highly recommend them & would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: My son wears these almost every day at school and months later they still look like new. He says his toes are never cold. I will be buying these again for my other kids. These boots live up to the Columbia name & reputation for quality and warmth.
customer_reviews.author: HannahSport

customer_reviews.title: Run slightly small but seem like a great boot.
customer_reviews.text: We just got our boots. Haven’t had a try in the snow yet, but they look and feel quite sturdy. The removable liner is a big plus for cleaning and for drying. They seem to run slightly small, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not what we expected
customer_reviews.text: This product was larger than I expected and also had no lining. I don't recall it mentioning that in the product description when I ordered. We returned these.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffster

customer_reviews.title: Love them for Minnesota!
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 pairs one for each daughter and they are hard on their boots Going strong on 2 months of hard core wear!
customer_reviews.author: DaycareMommyof4

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Great product from Columbia. Have a 9 yr old son who goes through shoes like nothing. These are durable and can take a beating. Insulation is good. Since hes a growing boy got 1 size bigger in hopes to get at least another year of life out of them.
customer_reviews.author: David Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great kids boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Second year ordering for my daughter and she has no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Nastassia

customer_reviews.title: great boots
customer_reviews.text: My son, who will be wearing these boots, says they feel good. Appear sturdy and well made. We have had one snow storm since the purchase and they kept his feet warm and dry. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expect from Columbia Brand. Great quality and durable.
customer_reviews.author: destiney Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: We love these boots. We have them in five different sizes for our five kids. They are great quality and keep our kids feet dry and warm in frigid North Dakota winters.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any kid
customer_reviews.text: Son loves em! Fits perfect and they lasted all winter and they still will fit him next year 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Orande

customer_reviews.title: the look great! I would have like a lighter boot though
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son boots are a little heavy and he complained something was poking him. I tried them on and didn't feel it but they are a little heavy. Overall snow and water proof.roomy enough for his pants to be tucked inside the boot.the look great! I would have like a lighter boot though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the style and color of these boots but when ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and color of these boots but when my son tried them in they were perfect size length wise but would slip on his heel and drove him crazy. So we had to send them back but was really easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Nik_e

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get on
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to get onto a childs foot - bought them for our 1 year old neice and could barely get them on. Would be better if they unzipped to make a larger opening.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey R Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Size up!
customer_reviews.text: These boots looking great, very well made, but runs small and narrow. Recommended size up.
customer_reviews.author: LaMujerDeAlejandro

customer_reviews.title: They are adorable but they are too small or perhaps too difficult ...
customer_reviews.text: They are adorable but they are too small or perhaps too difficult to put on... In unfortunately they don't have a bigger size ... My munchkin is a size 7 (that's the size I bought)... I will have to return
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love these, but were too small and not comfortable on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M.

customer_reviews.title: Good snow boot
customer_reviews.text: My son said they keep his feet warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots for my 2 year old son. They are easy to get on his feet and he can easily walk around in them. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Waldoch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots for snow
customer_reviews.text: Happy with purchase, bought these for my nephews for upcoming winter, I measured their feet and bought about a size up for them to get long use out them this school year.
customer_reviews.author: Marvispecks

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boot keeps feet warm and dry love the line or you can remove to make sure it’s dry before your next time going out into the cold
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Good overall boot but my daughter had to go up ...
customer_reviews.text: Good overall boot but my daughter had to go up 1 full size for it to fil. There is not a lacing and the velcro strap really doesn't provide a perfect cinch but otherwise the boots are good.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: These boots are great! We live in a snowy town and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great! We live in a snowy town and it's hard to find boots that don't leak. These have been great. They are very comfy according to my son. Plus! They look great.
customer_reviews.author: Saved by Grace

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable child's winter boot.
customer_reviews.text: These are for my eight-year-old son, and he wears them, so I guess they're fine. He wouldn't wear the last pair we bought. Thumbs up so far, but we haven't had much winter, yet. They are easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Springbok

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Living in a lot of Snow
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son loves these boots. He really likes how the tops tighten up, he says that keeps all the snow out. I will definitely be buying another pair for next winter.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, but I should have gone one size ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boot, but I should have gone one size up (just for getting them on and off), but they still fit. Nice patting inside! And good traction.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: My son likes them. They seem to keep his feet warm and dry so far!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony V.

customer_reviews.title: It's hard to review something like this when you're not the one wearing it
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a really well built toddler boot. It's hard to review something like this when you're not the one wearing it, but no complaints so far...and it really, really seems well constructed. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Craig C. Grundmeier

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, warm, and water resistant! My 6 yr old son played in the snow non-stop and these boots kept his feet warm and dry - definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Annie G.

customer_reviews.title: Look great, just a bit small
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look great and look like they will last through many snows. I only gave 3 stars because they are a bit smaller than what I had thought. I even ordered a size bigger so we could wear them longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best boots for young boys. Warm, durable and look great!
customer_reviews.author: emily scott

customer_reviews.title: These were delivered today, so I can't attest to ...
customer_reviews.text: These were delivered today, so I can't attest to the quality in the long run. But, they kept my daughter's feet dry and warm and they seem to be made really well. I ordered the size 1 in little girls because my daughter can wear a 13 or 13.5. They only come in whole sizes so I would suggest to size up to nearest whole size.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Hanba

customer_reviews.title: Pleased a 4th grader...😉
customer_reviews.text: Just got the boots and my daughter tried them on! Terrific fit and seems they will have room for her to grow so may get two season out of them as we ordered a size larger than her sneaker fit. Will update after they have been snow tested but look to be a very high quality boot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm & Dry!
customer_reviews.text: My son has multiple pairs of boots....farm, school, play...etc. These are his favorite pair. He says that his feet never get cold or wet.
customer_reviews.author: Penny PincherTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Boys Columbia snowboot.
customer_reviews.text: FIt, lining and warmth, waterproof. Snug at top so snow doesn't get in. Just right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boot. I bought two because I have twin boys. They seem to fit smaller than other boots that we have bought but they get the job done by keeping my boys' feet warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl C

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Delivered very fast. In time for our trip to mountains. Fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: RJAY

customer_reviews.title: Order bigger size!
customer_reviews.text: Order size or 2 up, they are smaller then normal! Otherwise great boots :)
customer_reviews.author: zachary bishop

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The boots Plastic edge digs into ankle. Liner not enough to pad from the rough edge.
customer_reviews.author: K-Rage

customer_reviews.title: These are super cozy warm boots
customer_reviews.text: These are super cozy warm boots, but the run about a full size too small because of the lining.
customer_reviews.author: P and T's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot, held up, easy on and off for 4 year old grandson. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Boots
customer_reviews.text: My son has been wearing these outside now that winter is here and he has had no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: LunkTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My 5yr olds feet were wet & cold but I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: My 5yr olds feet were wet & cold but I'm not sure if it's because of the way she plays in the snow or if it's the product itself
customer_reviews.author: Monique D

customer_reviews.title: Nice snow boots
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I ordered two sizes larger. They were still a little big but when I tied the top i.e. Kept the boots on and there was no problem.
customer_reviews.author: I. Sutter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is a perfect quality and a nice price !!! My son is ready for the snow !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My toddler didn't get to wear them, run too small.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Chipman

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I find Columbia boots to be worth the money every Winter. One pair lasts all season. The inserts coming out helps them dry quick!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Northern Michigan winters? No problem, we got your feet covered!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are a playground necessity in Michigan winters. Warm, waterproof, easy on and easy off, just what we needed but couldn't find in our local stores. I would recommend these boots to anyone who has to endure big winter weather with an active outdoor child.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Dry
customer_reviews.text: These boots keep kids’ feet warm and dry during Michigan winters.
customer_reviews.author: Creative Order

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter adores the boots and they look and fit great!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter adores the boots and they look and fit great!!! Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ozell Antonio Macklin

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. Super fun colors and style. Warm too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, although they aren't quite waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, although they aren't quite waterproof. My son comes home every day from playing outside in the snow at school with wet insoles. He loves them, which is why I'm giving the boots a 4/5
customer_reviews.author: ZimLondie

customer_reviews.title: Good for Colorado winters
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. Snuggley warm. Good for Colorado winters.
customer_reviews.author: John Wick and Dani California

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality; Columbia is my favorite brand for children's snow boots.
customer_reviews.author: Trace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, fits well, kept my son’s feet warm and dry
customer_reviews.author: R. W.

customer_reviews.title: Seems good.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up for my son due to some of the reviews, he says they fit well and they seem to have nice padding on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: MSH Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these when they are running a sale and we love these boots. They're strong waterproof and very warm for my 5 year old. Definitely a great deal for a nice boot.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2girls

customer_reviews.title: Little big but worth it. Well made and warm.
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr old son loved these. Stays dry and are well made. I'm glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

product_meta.title: Columbia Youth Powderbug Plus II-K Snow Boot
product_meta.description: A winter warrior — fortified with warm felt insulation, and waterproof construction, this child’s boot is perfect for sledding, inner-tubing, or making igloos. The Youth Powderbug Plus II Snow Boot will keep little feet happy and warm for hours of fun and play. These winter snow boots feature a synthetic leather and nylon textile that's seam-sealed and waterproof. Simple entry with hook and loop ankle fit and adjustment, combine with a drawcord adjustable gaiter cuff, all come together to make for a comfortable fitting winter boot that will keep their feet dry, warm, and happy in the white winter fluff. Columbia offers these youth winter snow boots in multiple colors, with true-to-size fit.
feature_bullets: WATERPROOF SNOW BOOT: The seam-sealed construction is made from a waterproof synthetic leather and nylon textile containing recycled 6mm washable recycled felt liner will provide all day dry comfort against the wettest of snow conditions

SUPER WARM INSULATION: The perfect combination of function and classic alpine style, these youth boots are packed with deep 400g insulation, sure to keep their feet warm and cozy in the cold white extremes
COLD WEATHER TRACTION: Built to dig in — in the extremes — the Columbia Youth Powderbug Plus II Snow Boot is made from a durable one-piece injection molded TPR shell and outsole

HANDY FEATURES: The perfect easy entry slip-on boot, with an adjustable hook and loop ankle closure strap. It includes a drawcord adjustable gaiter to cinch in warm and dry feet, while locking out the snow
TEMPERATURE RATINGS: Rated -25F/-32C for cold, heavy snow days
